PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter (C)ustomer or (S)alesrep DropDown PPDField01 1 1 R Enter a valid option. H C,S C,S
Enter Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 8 R Enter a valid customer number or (ALL)
Enter Salesrep No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 3 R Enter a Valid Salesrep # or (ALL)
Enter (D)ollars or (U)nits DropDown PPDField04 1 1 R Do you want (D)ollars or (U)nits to print on the report? H D,U DOLLARS (IN THOUSANDS),UNITS
Enter Budget Year (YYYY) Text PPDField05 3 4 R Enter a valid year (Ex. 2002)
Enter Starting Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField06 3 6 R Enter a valid starting period (YYYYPP)
Enter Ending Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField07 3 6 R Enter a valid ending period (YYYYPP)
